mapper.sql: a.id as id ,a.chongwu_id as chongwuId ,a.yonghu_id as yonghuId ,a.chongwu_liuyan_text as chongwuLiuyanText ,a.insert_time as insertTime ,a.reply_text as replyText ,a.update_time as updateTime ,a.create_time as createTime
mapper.select:
SELECT
-- 级联表的字段 ,chongwu.chongwu_name as chongwuName ,chongwu.chongwu_photo as chongwuPhoto ,chongwu.chongwu_types as chongwuTypes ,chongwu.chongwu_content as chongwuContent ,yonghu.yonghu_name as yonghuName ,yonghu.yonghu_photo as yonghuPhoto ,yonghu.yonghu_phone as yonghuPhone ,yonghu.yonghu_email as yonghuEmail ,yonghu.yonghu_delete as yonghuDelete
FROM chongwu_liuyan a left JOIN chongwu chongwu ON a.chongwu_id = chongwu.id left JOIN yonghu yonghu ON a.yonghu_id = yonghu.id
and a.id in
#{item}
and ( a.chongwu_id = #{params.chongwuId} )
and ( a.yonghu_id = #{params.yonghuId} )
and a.chongwu_liuyan_text like CONCAT('%',#{params.chongwuLiuyanText},'%')
and UNIX_TIMESTAMP(a.insert_time) >= UNIX_TIMESTAMP(#{params.insertTimeStart})
and UNIX_TIMESTAMP(a.insert_time) <= UNIX_TIMESTAMP(#{params.insertTimeEnd})
and a.reply_text like CONCAT('%',#{params.replyText},'%')
and UNIX_TIMESTAMP(a.update_time) >= UNIX_TIMESTAMP(#{params.updateTimeStart})
and UNIX_TIMESTAMP(a.update_time) <= UNIX_TIMESTAMP(#{params.updateTimeEnd})
and a.chongwu_id IS NOT NULL
and chongwu.chongwu_name like CONCAT('%',#{params.chongwuName},'%')
and chongwu.chongwu_types = #{params.chongwuTypes}
and chongwu.chongwu_content like CONCAT('%',#{params.chongwuContent},'%')
and a.yonghu_id IS NOT NULL
and yonghu.yonghu_name like CONCAT('%',#{params.yonghuName},'%')
and yonghu.yonghu_phone like CONCAT('%',#{params.yonghuPhone},'%')
and yonghu.yonghu_email like CONCAT('%',#{params.yonghuEmail},'%')
and yonghu.yonghu_delete >= #{params.yonghuDeleteStart}
and yonghu.yonghu_delete <= #{params.yonghuDeleteEnd}
and yonghu.yonghu_delete = #{params.yonghuDelete}
order by a.${params.orderBy} desc
